sense.def:
Pain
je neprijeten telesni občutek, ki ga povzroča bolezen ali poškodba.

seg.quote: She complained of severe pains in her chest.

sense.def:
Pain
je tudi trpljenje, ko se nam zgodi kaj zelo neprijetnega.

seg.quote: ...the pain of realizing that she had failed.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
pains someone
, je tista oseba zaradi tistega zelo prizadeta ali nesrečna.

seg.quote: It pained him that his father talked like that.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
a pain
ali
a pain in the neck
, nas zelo jezi ali razburja;

Kadar človek
take pains to do something
, si zelo prizadeva, da bi tisto naredil uspešno.

seg.quote: She took great pains to conceal this from her parents.
She always took great pains with her make-up.
